tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE kitchen_inventory (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255),
  quantity INT,
  supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
  last_ordered_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE supply_orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  order_date DATE,
  delivery_date DATE,
  appliance_id INT,
  quantity_ordered INT
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    appliance_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    quantity_ordered INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
    supplier_address VARCHAR(100),
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE appliances (
    appliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    appliance_name VARCHAR(255),
    appliance_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
    supplier_location VARCHAR(100),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_date DATE,
    supplier_id INT,
    appliance_id INT,
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE stock (
    stock_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    appliance_id INT,
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE smart_kitchen_appliances (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  appliance_name STRING,
  appliance_type STRING,
  manufacturer_name STRING,
  quantity INT,
  last_order_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE suppliers (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name STRING,
  contact_person STRING,
  phone_number STRING,
  email STRING)

CREATE TABLE orders (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  order_date DATE,
  total_cost DECIMAL,
  status STRING)

CREATE TABLE order_items (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  order_id UUID,
  appliance_id UUID,
  quantity INT,
  unit_price DECIMAL)

CREATE TABLE appliance_categories (id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name STRING,
  description STRING)
